DescriptionData.Title: Amerikan Body Art Opaque Glitter - Deep Burgundy (0.5 oz)
DescriptionData.Description: Amerikan Body Art Opaque Deep Burgundy Cosmetic Glitter is single color opaque polyester glitter with a fantastic metallic finish, ideal for facepainting, glitter eyeliner, and glitter tattoos. Opaque Holographic Jewels glitter adds color and a bold finish to your face paint design. If you want the face paint to show through, please use sheer and semi sheer glitter instead. All of Amerikan Body Arts polyester glitter is made from hexagonal .008 sized polyester and is safe for use on body and face. Amerikan Body Art Deep Burgundy Glitter is made in the USA and comes in a 0.5 or 2 ounce container.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Polyester glitter is made from hexagonal 008 sized polyester
